column2: Danfoss is looking for an experienced Test Consultant for the CRM area of Danfoss Group Digital IT (DGDIT). This team is responsible for implementing and executing the Functional Test for Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems which includes Salesforce, supporting Danfoss in its digitalization and electrification agenda across the globe.              The role as Test Consultant includes, but not limited to Functional/Manual testing in an CRM environment. You will join a motivated and diverse team, which is highly engaged in (agile) software development, test automation and latest technology.             Danfoss Oragadam campus is India s first LEED Platinum rated constructed manufacturing facility a modern green campus with state-of the-art facilities, from where our employees design, innovate, manufacture and promote products for both India and outside market.             As our new colleague, you will be part of a well-functioning global team of committed and skilled IT consultants, who are front runners within CRM, implementing the OneCRM solutions for our customers.                        Job Responsibilities               ?         1. Analyse the User Stories/Requirements and Identify the Test scope needed to Validate the solution.   2. Design and Execute Smoke / Functional / Regression / API / Data Migration Test cases for the User stories within a Sprint (Agile/Scrum).   3. Work closely with Module Test Lead to Design and Execute End-to-End Functional Integration Test cases before Go-Live.   4. Analyse the Test Results and ensure issues are addressed (Defect Management).   5. Ensure Accuracy, Coverage, and traceability for the Test cases.   6. Report test activities and metrics to the Module Test lead.   7. Collaborate with Business consultants/Business users, Development team to test and verify that solutions will meet the business requirements.   8. Work proactively with the project team to identify risks/key issues that affect quality and work with the project teams to mitigate them.   9. Adhere to best practices in testing while continuing to improve the quality and productivity.   10.Use Azure DevOps and Azure Test Plan effectively for all the Test Management activities and Reporting.                   The ideal candidate possesses these skills.                   ?         1. Degree Holder in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related disciplines.    2. 4-6 years experience of Quality Assurance experience.   3. Minimum 2-3 years experience as Salesforce Quality Analyst.   4. Experience in Handling Testing for Sales cloud (strong in Case Management - Web to Case , E mail to Case , escalation, Assignment rules, Milestone Validation, Partner Portal Testing) is a must.    5. Experience with APIs and API testing tools Postman is an added advantage.   6. Experience with Data Migration Testing   7. Experience building test plans, test cases and test scenarios.   8. Background with end-to-end testing process and methods in Salesforce environment including System Integration Testing.   9. Have In-depth understanding of Salesforce capabilities and constraints.   10. Experience with defining and reporting QA metrics for defined releases.   11. Experience in executing Testing in an Agile/Scrum methodology, is a must.   12. Admin Certification in Salesforce will be an added advantage.   13. Experience in Test Automation with Tools like TOSCA or any other Test automation Tool will be an added advantage.   14. Any Experience with Sales Cloud/Quote / Marketing Cloud /Partner community testing is an added advantage.                 General Skills                   ?         1. Strong analytical skills with excellent problem-solving abilities   2. Excellent communication (written and oral) and documentation skills in English   3. Excellent analytical skills   4. Self-organized and structured person

column2: As part of the QA team, a new role has been created to support our growing product suite. You will ensure a high standard of product functionality with every release by identifying bugs and design gaps as well as documenting problems encountered at a sufficient level of detail for development teams to resolve quickly. Clear communication in articulating complex problems in plain English and proposing timely solutions to Product and Engineer stakeholders is critical.      The QA Engineer must be familiar with Software Quality Assurance methodologies and show ownership from start to completion. It will be expected you will spend a portion of your time working with the internal development team, and possibly UAT teams depending on the nature of the solution being tested. The team is comprised of highly experienced developers (front end, back end and full stack), technical architects, and other QA teams. A proactive working style with focus on delivering results and the ability to balance competing priorities will be essential to success.     Job duties     Main responsibilities will include:       Work with a teams to test end-to-end solution.     Establish QA procedures, maintain consistency and continuous improvement of ways of working.     Review and suggest proposed acceptance criteria and test cases during early stages of process and provide details of trade-offs to decision makers collaboratively.     Create and executes testing scenarios/test cases and user acceptance criteria providing clear technical &, where relevant, business information on any issues identified.     Work with, and support internal teams, product management, UX, and technical resources on acceptance criteria, issue logging and tracking, and ongoing testing and release management.     Actively participate in daily, weekly & sprint-related team meetings and brainstorming activities related to project issues, collaborate with development, architecture & product management     Analyze discrepancies in service or performance and make recommendations for product or service updates.     Story priming in Jira to cover scenarios to align business requirements     Test reports with initial triaging.     Create Seed data and test data for different scenarios.     Look into test automation to improve efficient around QA tasks overtime.       Key requirements       Solid experience testing Data centric applications     Experience with understaning test strategy, write and execute test cases for feature testing, regression testing, sanity, smoke and end to end system testing     Proficient in debugging and troubleshooting including use of Data tools and developer tools for data collection and issue reporting     Experience with test automation tools (e.g., Selenium, Cucumber/Gherkin) will be a plus     Experience with Cloud Platform tools and services (GCP/Bigquery) will be a plus     High attention to detail and solid analytical skills is a must     Highly motivated and self-starter approach to job. Able to work independently as part of a globally distributed team, proactively requesting assistance, advice and input as needed     To maximize working time with different teams around the world     Adaptable and change-resilient, working well in a dynamic fast-paced global environment, accepting new ideas and initiatives and making positive use of opportunities presented.     Demonstrated capacity to plan, prioritize and organize time, project schedules and multiple project activities     A degree of creativity in developing and executing tests is required     Solid knowledge of IT Methodologies and Software Development Lifecycle for information systems development, testing principles, project methodologies and practice     Mastering iterative agile development methodologies     Working knowledge of SQL       Experience requirements       At least 5 to 7 years of experience in a similar position     Must complete bachelor's degree.

column2: A UI/UX (User Interface/User Experience) Designer is a professional who specializes in creating user-centered designs for digital products and experiences     They focus on designing interfaces that are visually appealing, intuitive, and provide a seamless and satisfying user experience         Here are some key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with the role of a UI/UX Designer:         User Research: Conducting user research to understand the needs, behaviors, and preferences of the target audience     UI/UX Designers gather insights through methods such as user interviews, surveys, and usability testing to inform the design process     Wireframing and Prototyping: Creating low-fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize and test design concepts     UI/UX Designers use tools like Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma to define the layout, information hierarchy, and interactions of the user interface     Visual Design: Developing the visual elements of the user interface, including color schemes, typography, icons, and graphics     UI/UX Designers create visually appealing and consistent designs that align with the brand identity and enhance the user experience     Information Architecture: Organizing and structuring information in a logical and intuitive manner     UI/UX Designers create navigation systems, sitemaps, and content hierarchies to ensure users can easily find and access the desired information or features     Interaction Design: Defining how users interact with the interface and designing interactive elements such as buttons, forms, menus, and animations     UI/UX Designers focus on creating intuitive and responsive interactions that guide users through the product or website

He should have the relevant expertise and experience to identify things that may fail, test them early in development cycle and raise a flag so that it can be fixed well in time. The Senior VV engineer is expected to have a good systemic understanding of the product to understand potential areas of improvement and also have an eye for detail at a component/feature level to recognize failure modes in subsystems such that they are represented well through a failure report in order to improve them in subsequent prototypes.     The Sr VV engineer would participate in Requirement specification creation/modification meetings in order to understand the product functions and prepare test strategies accordingly. Hold discussions with design team to get an in-depth understanding of functionalities and prepare test protocols to cover all aspects of design and usage. Carry out test plan realization which is defined from the specifications. Lead the testing campaign, including the execution of the tests. Train other VV resources on test planning and execution. Analyze result of the testing and communicate them to stakeholders. Define a consistent standard for final test report preparation in accordance with the project procedures.     Work with the QC team to define the QAP plan for products that move from development to production.     Understand the testing requirements for UAV (domestic and international) and get them certified for the same. Work with certification agencies/labs to be able to carry out product testing and qualification.     Understand the long term testing requirements of design team and procure the right test equipment for inhouse testing and manage them inhouse. Should have passion for engineering statistics and testing in order to perform testing with high degree of confidence in the system with the right sample size selection.               SKILLS QUALIFICATION         Engineering degree in Mechanical, Electrical or Electronics.      8+ years of experience in Engineering/RD discipline with at least 4+ years in VV vertical     Ability to lead/mentor a team of 3-6 VV Engineers     Good understanding of Engineering statistics and testing methodologies.     Experience with testing and calibration equipment is a must.             KEY SHARED ACCOUNTABILITIES:               - Resposible for managing the VV verticle within Engineering department of the company     -    Creation of Product Test plan, Test Protocol and Test Reports.       -    Represent the VV department and communicate effectively with management, Design team, Prototyping team, Project manager and other stakeholders to ensure VV is carried out efficiently and effectively for products under development.       -    Train and lead new resources on VV understanding                   Customers: Competence to build and effectively manage interpersonal relationships at all levels with different clients and vendors.         Work Closely with engineering team to understand the needs and deliver by maintaining harmonious relationship.                     DESIRED BEHAVIOURAL VALUES:         Commitment to common purpose and goals     Seating respect on the table     Displaying Integrity and Ethic     Taking initiative and ownership     Being passionate about making a difference

column2: We are looking for: We are seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Manual Test Engineer to join our dynamic team at Pinetics, a leading embedded electronics product design company. As a Senior Manual Test Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our embedded electronic products through meticulous manual testing processes. Will be responsible for: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases based on product specifications and requirements. Execute manual test cases to identify defects, bugs, and issues in embedded electronics products. Conduct thorough regression testing to ensure that software changes and enhancements do not adversely affect existing functionality. Collaborate closely with the product development team to understand product requirements and design effective testing strategies. Analyze test results and provide detailed reports to stakeholders, including identifying areas for improvement and recommending corrective actions. Participate in design and code reviews to provide feedback on testability and identify potential areas of concern. Work closely with software developers to reproduce and debug issues reported during testing. Contribute to the continuous improvement of testing processes and methodologies to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Good at handling a team of test engineers and monitoring their tasks.  Requirements and skills needed in the job: 5 to 7 Years of proven experience in embedded electronics testing.  Basic understanding of electronic Product design cycle & Hardware development process.  Familiar with industry specifications and requirements of electronic Product Testing.  Familiar with Embedded Software development process, Unit level testing and Life cycle Management.  Solid understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC) and testing methodologies. Follow established test plans and test cases to ensure consistent and accurate testing results.  Identify, document, and report defects, bugs, or issues discovered during testing.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and designers, to resolve issues and improve product quality.  Collect and analyze data from tests to provide valuable insights and feedback to the hardware and Firmware development teams.  Maintain detailed records of test results, defects, and testing methodologies. Write clear and concise test reports and documentation.  Ensure that products meet quality standards, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices.  Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN) and issue tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Bugzilla) is a plus.  Experience with EMI / EMC and type testing of electronic products is an added advantage. Familiarity with embedded development tools and platforms (e.g., ARM, AVR) Experience with test management tools and defect tracking systems. Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN) and issue tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Bugzilla) is a plus.  Good to Have: Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, Python, or scripting languages for test automation.  Familiarity with regulatory standards and compliance testing for electronic products (e.g., FCC, CE) is a plus. Certifications such as ISTQB, Certified Test Engineer (CSTE), or Certified Software Quality Analyst (CSQA) are advantageous. Should have the following qualifications: Bachelors degree in E&TC or Computer Science, or a related field.
column11: Test Engineering, C++, Git, C, SVN, embedded electronics testing, JIRA, Bugzilla, CSTE, Python, CSQA

column2: The successful candidate will be integral to the co-development and implementation of electronic order routing interfaces between Interactive Brokers (IBKR) and its clients. Involvement will start in the pre-sale stages and conclude with successful production deployment.             The position requires an extensive understanding of the FIX protocol, the most commonly used infrastructure for many institutions and enterprises to electronically route multi-asset orders to IBKR, as well as practical experience with implementing and testing FIX interfaces for order routing applications. Additional responsibilities include but are not limited to configuring test environments for development and quality assurance purposes, coordinating production releases of new interfaces and maintaining project documentation.           Qualifications:         Bachelors degree or above         Excellent command of spoken and written English         Professional proficiency in at least one additional language (Japanese, Cantonese or Mandarin) is highly preferred.         Strong analytical and numerical skills and a critical-thinking mindset         Strong FIX protocol knowledge and 2-3 years of solid experience, ideally in the fields of technical support or quality assurance         Familiar with UNIX/Linux systems and command-line environments         Knowledge of telecommunications equipment and network connectivity setups         Prior brokerage or financial industry experience is a plus.         Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Perl, Python, Awk, shells) is preferred.

column2: We are looking for a Software Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer to develop and execute exploratory and automated tests to ensure product quality. QA engineer responsibilities include designing and implementing tests, debugging and defining corrective actions. You will also review system requirements and track quality assurance metrics (e.g. defect densities and open defect counts.) The QA role plays an important part in our company s product development process. Ultimately, you should monitor all stages of software development to identify and resolve system malfunctions to meet quality standards.         Key Responsibilities           Build test scripts, manage tests, lead testing processes, and document and report test results.         Work with subject matter experts to understand requirements and develop test cases and scenarios.         Perform Functional, System, Integration, Regression, API, and Workflow testing.         Clearly document/communicate/organize discovered issues for developers to resolve and follow up.         Organize test plan/test case reviews.         Coordinate User Acceptance Testing.         Certify system changes once released to production.         Test multiple projects at one time.         Contribute to process improvement initiatives.         Mentor junior resources.         Qualifications         Bachelor s degree in computer science, engineering or related technical field         5+ years of experience in software development and testing.         Experience in testing ERP systems.         Excellent analytical, organizational, time management, multi-tasking and follow up skills.         Self-motivated with the ability to work both independently and as part of a team.         Diligent and meticulous.         Experience in testing IBM AS400 iSeries Systems is a must

column2: Tech Analyst - AWD : Are you curious, motivated, and forward-thinking? You'll have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging and relevant issues in Oracle and Cloud technology team. Our talented people empower us, and we believe in being part of a team that is open, collaborative, entrepreneurial, passionate and above all fun. What you will be doing ? This position is with Retirement group with following Responsibilities :  - Involves in the analysis of information provided by a large number of sources.  - Decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding of requirements, assess the current capabilities of the enterprise and identify gaps which prevent it from meeting business needs, Identify where change is required to achieve objectives, and document gaps and solution opportunities. - Specify detailed requirements according to standard templates, using natural language. - Write business requirements that are clear, concise, accurate and at the appropriate level of detail to ensure understanding by the business stakeholder team.  - Document and maintain requirements by performing requirements analysis and verification. - Work with Business Analyst to understand business problems and rewrite them into fast and efficient solutions that ultimately help our customers. What you bring ? - Ability to use effective facilitation skills and techniques to elicit requirements from a diverse range of stakeholders and group size. - Effective influencing and negotiating skills. - Excellent written and verbal communication skills. - Knowledge of when and how to use business assessment tools (e.g., feasibility studies, business cases and/or cost/benefit, project sizing and costing, and current state analysis/needs assessments). - Understanding of how the people, processes and technology within an organization interact in relationships and patterns to create a feasible solution on projects of medium to high complexity. - Process oriented, logical thinker. - Strong negotiation and influencing skills. - Experience in creating and/or participating in the planning and estimating of full SDLC activities - Proficient at managing self to meet established delivery dates on multiple assignments. - Ability to master complex tasks with minimal supervision. - Adaptable and able to learn quickly. - Experience with System Integration. - Experienced working in a matrix environment. - Proficient in developing test strategies, test plans, establishing test data, executing test scenarios and managing/tracking issues. - Skilled in the use of  Visio  or other process or flow chart tool. - Strong knowledge of business processes related to business channel supported. - Must be able to meet with clients of varying levels to gather, document, and analyze system specifications and requirements, work closely with developers and testers in the fast-paced environment. - Ability to offer solutions and the business impact to clients in a clear and concise manner.  - Ability to work collaboratively with others in team environment. Skills :  - Minimum of 3-5 years of mutual fund or financial industry experience in an operations and/or project role. - Experience with the  AWD application  (preferred) or any other workflow application as either a user or an administrator. - Experience with  system configurations  and workflow updates. - Strong knowledge of the Retirement Plan business. - Experience using Microsoft Office Suite. - Ability to translate complex business requirements into detailed functional and/or technical specifications. - Demonstrated ability to develop alternative solutions to complex problems and recommend the best solution to the business and project team. - Ability to apply acquired knowledge from prior experience effectively in new situations (medium to high complexity)  - Demonstrated advanced analytical and problem solving skills. Qualifications :  - Degree or equivalent - Demonstrated ability to analyze complex situations and learn new processes and technologies quickly - Previous experience in the Financial Services Industry, specifically as related to defined contribution and define benefits administration Competencies :  - Excellent communicator  - Ability to discuss technical and commercial solutions to internal and external parties and adapt depending on the technical or business focus of the discussion - Attention to detail  - Track record of authoring high quality documentation - Organized approach  - Manage and adapt priorities according to client and internal requirements - Self-starter but team mindset - work autonomously and as part of a global team

column2: Roles & Responsibility : - Advanced Automation Development : Create, design, and implement sophisticated automation solutions using VMware technologies, leveraging scripting languages (e.g., PowerShell, Python, PowerCLI) to streamline and optimize workflows. - Scripting for Infrastructure Management : Develop scripts and automation workflows to manage and provision VMware-based infrastructure, including virtual machines, clusters, networks, and storage, ensuring efficiency and scalability. - Troubleshooting Automation : Utilize automation and scripting skills to troubleshoot complex issues within VMware environments, developing scripts for diagnostic purposes and rapid problem resolution. - Integration and Orchestration : Integrate VMware technologies with third-party tools and systems, leveraging APIs and scripting frameworks to create seamless workflows and enhance overall system efficiency. - Best Practices and Optimization : Establish and promote best practices for automation, scripting, and code management within VMware environments, continuously optimizing processes to improve reliability, performance, and maintainability. Qualifications : Any IT Graduate Total Experience :  - 8+ years of hands-on experience in VMware technologies, encompassing vSphere, vCenter, and ESXi.  - Proficiency in scripting languages like PowerShell, Python, or Bash for automation and management tasks within VMware environments.  - Strong troubleshooting skills, system administration expertise, and familiarity with automation tools such as Ansible or Terraform are highly valued. Certification : VMware certifications VCAP/VCP-CMA
column11: VMware vSphere, PowerShell, Automation Development, system administration, Terraform, VMware vCenter, Troubleshooting, Python

column2: We are looking for a Test Analyst to join our growing QA team in our dynamic Gurgaon office.          This is an awesome opportunity for a proactive and problem-solving individual to develop their skills in a fun and stimulating consultancy environment.          The role would suit a computer science graduate with a genuine passion for testing. You don t need prior knowledge of Provar or Salesforce, as we can give you all the training you will need. You should have a proven development track record and a professional, dedicated and flexible approach.              What you'll do:                  Perform testing for new product features and contribute to regression testing of the product.              Review user stories and prepare test scenarios and also maintain existing test suites for different components of the product.             Writing automation scripts on provar & selenium javascript based framework using typescript as a scripting language.              Perform test execution and report defects and problems that arise while software test              Being innovative in your testing and providing solutions to automate the manual tasks performed by the testing team.              Working as one team and cross collaborate with dev & product teams to brainstorm and identify business use case & scenarios during requirement refinement phase              Be proactive in assessing & highlighting the risks to your product steering group & work in a collaborative manner and help the team      with delivery.              Focus on self learning, continuous improvement and improve product knowledge and test automation expertise.              Scaling up your knowledge on salesforce through training and trailheads.              Escalating any issues to your line manager promptly                you'll have:               4 - 6 years of software testing experience with strong understanding of testing life cycle and methodologies.          Knowledge and experience of web/desktop automation tools preferably selenium with Java as a language.          Experience with Salesforce projects and clouds like Service Cloud, Sales Cloud etc         Working experience with development of custom Salesforce applications and packages.         Preferably having a Salesforce Admin Certification or other Salesforce certifications.         Good Knowledge of at least one programming language          Working knowledge of agile methodologies                you'll be:               Having strong analytical and problem solving skills, should be able to research and understand an undocumented set up and application          Having excellent communication skills (speaking, writing and presenting)          Having a proactive, organized and collaborative approach with a can do attitude          Able to work in a team environment                It may be advantageous to also have these skills:               Salesforce.com testing or testing of other SaaS (Software as a Service) applications.          Good understanding of Selenium          Understanding of Web Services & experience in writing SQL queries          Knowledge of Desktop, Performance tools                you'll benefit from:               A competitive salary          Comprehensive health insurance          A vibrant and fun work culture, with regular social activities         Friendly work colleagues who genuinely care about other         A truly diverse working environment          The chance to work with international work colleagues          The opportunity to grow and develop your career
column11: Health insurance, Analytical, Test execution, Javascript, Agile, Test scenarios, Regression testing, Selenium, Continuous improvement

column2: A bachelors degree in business administration, computer science, information systems, or a related field is often required.                     A Business System Analyst (BSA) is a professional who plays a crucial role in the design, development, and implementation of business systems and processes within an organization.                  They act as a liaison between business stakeholders and technical teams to ensure that the organizations technology solutions align with its business goals and requirements.                           Responsibilities:                               Analyze current business processes, gather complex business requirements, prepare functional design to provide robust and scalable solutions.                Write user stories using Agile SCRUM methodologies               Experience with end to end quote to cash business processes               Experience with stakeholder management and working with multiple teams (Business, onsite, offshore and cross functional teams).               Propose and simplify design for end to end quoting process including new quotes, MACDs, renewals, termination etc               Troubleshoot and resolve the system issues within given SLAs               Develop test strategy, test cases, and perform functional, integration, and regression testing of the application                   Required skills:                 Oracle CPQ

column2: The Company           Gentrack provides leading utilities across the world with innovative cleantech solutions. The global pace of change is accelerating, and utilities need to rebuild for a more sustainable future. Working with some of the world s biggest energy and water companies, as well as innovative challenger brands, we are helping companies reshape what it means to be a utilities business. We are driven by our passion to create positive impact. That is why utilities rely on us to drive innovation, deliver great customer experiences and secure profits. Together, we are renewing utilities.                Our Values and Culture                 Purpose of Role:            You will be expected to work either independently or as part of a cross functional project team, where you will be testing the Junifer Utilities software product to provide assurance to our customers of the quality of their Junifer release. The changes you test will be small to large sized changes where you will be writing and executing the test case. Your duties will include attending daily stand-ups to provide updates to the rest of the cross functional team, reviewing Change Requests/User Stories/Acceptance Criteria, writing and executing test scripts, reporting defects adhering to internal JIRA defect guidelines, periodic reporting of progress for internal/external audiences, and retesting of any defect fixes.                Your success will be measured by:          Your ability to understand the Velocity Utilities software application.          Your ability to understand changes to the application functionality based on User Stories, existing documentation, test cases and developer walk throughs.          Ability to test software products to ensure the product is stable.          Identifying and implementing ways to improve solutions, systems, and processes.          Recommending improvements to existing software programs as necessary.          Ability to take on mainstream tasks within the scrum team, and to proactively acquire the product and industry knowledge necessary to deliver your contributions.          Active participation in all aspects of Agile software development, including:          o Punctual and reliable attendance at all team meetings including daily stand ups.          o Clear communication of what you have done since the last stand up and what you are planning today.          o Clear communication to your team about any obstacles or blockers.          o Regular input/contribution is provided at task planning sessions.          o Task planning activities fit well to the actual work required to complete a story, i.e. individual activity is in line with the task board.          o Active involvement in grooming of the backlog.          o Emphasis on the importance of team play, made evident by interactions with team members and the wider company with positive relationships as a result.               The successful delivery of software from your team to customers.          Feedback on the quality of your testing from your team, technical reviewers, Leads and Managers.          Ability to solve problems identified within the team.          Ability to document findings of how to overcome a problem you solved and communicate this to the team.                   Principal Responsibilities / Accountabilities:                               Support BAU activities by creating and executing detailed test cases.          Support test activities including identification of test conditions, creation and execution of test cases for project work.          Communicate effectively with the Test Senior, development and management teams when required.          Understand the operating procedures of the Test processes within Gentrack.          Identify areas of improvement in the testing life cycle and share the same with the Test Senior / Lead to reduce time to deployment and ensure quality of test deliverables.          Documenting mildly complex processes or procedures you identify that may be of benefit to other testers.          Participating in planning, stand-ups, estimation, retrospectives and backlog grooming as appropriate.          Invest in personal training and development to maintain and advance your performance overtime.                     Person Specification:                   Experience / Knowledge          2-3.5 years commercial manual software testing experience.          Strong experience and knowledge of software testing lifecycle with Agile, Waterfall and mixed methodologies.          Good working knowledge of testing management tools i.e., TestRail and JIRA.          Good working knowledge of relevant technologies and concepts including SQL Server, Client/Server applications, CRM, Postman, Utilities industry.          Good working experience of SQL statements.          Good working experience of REST API.               Personal Attributes         Can do attitude.          Able to work proficiently both independently and in a team environment.          Proactive.          A passion for excellence and a commitment to be the best.          High attention to detail.          Excellent relationship management and interpersonal skills.          An open-minded consultative approach.          Ability to creatively solve problems.          Ability to give and receive positive and constructive feedback               Qualifications / Education         Bachelor s Degree in an IT related degree, or comparable professional development and commercial experience.          ISTQB Foundation certification.               Specialised Skills         Billing systems.          CRM knowledge.          Software Testing.          Problem solving.          Innovative Thinking
column11: Relationship management, Billing, Agile, Scrum, Test cases, Principal, CRM, SQL, Testing

column2: As a Salesforce QA Specialist, you will play a critical role      The quality and performance of our Salesforce applications and solutions.      You will work closely with development teams, business analysts, and stakeholders to define test plans, execute test cases, and report defects to ensure the successful deployment of Salesforce-based projects.            Key Responsibilities              Test Planning:    Collaborate with project stakeholders to define test objectives, strategies, and test plans for Salesforce projects.        Test Case Development:    Create detailed test cases, test scripts, and test data sets that cover various scenarios and use cases within Salesforce applications.        Test Execution:    Execute test cases manually and/or using automated testing tools to identify defects, inconsistencies, and performance issues.        Defect Tracking:    Log and track defects in a systematic manner, including clear and concise descriptions, steps to reproduce, and severity assessments. Work closely with development teams to ensure timely resolution.        Regression Testing:    Perform regression testing to ensure that new code changes do not adversely affect existing functionality.        Integration Testing:    Verify the integration of Salesforce with other systems, ensuring data consistency and functionality across platforms.        Performance Testing:    Conduct performance and load testing to assess the scalability and responsiveness of Salesforce applications.        Documentation:    Maintain detailed records of test cases, test results, and defect reports. Create and update QA documentation as needed.        Collaboration:    Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, business analysts, and project managers, to ensure alignment on project goals and quality standards.        Continuous Improvement:    Stay up to date with Salesforce updates, best practices, and industry trends. Recommend and implement improvements to the QA process.            Qualifications            Strong understanding of Salesforce platform functionality and configuration.      Experience in creating and executing test plans, test cases, and test scripts.      Proficiency in defect tracking and management tools (e.g., Jira).      Knowledge of automated testing tools (e.g., Selenium, Salesforce Test Automation).      Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodologies.      Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.      Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.      Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality results.      Salesforce certifications (e.g., Salesforce Administrator, Salesforce Platform App Builder) are a plus.
column11: Load testing, Test scripts, Testing tools, Performance testing, Agile, Regression testing, Scrum, Selenium, Test cases, JIRA

column2: The QA Architect is a senior position responsible for managing QA processes, defining and implementing test strategy, test plans & test execution of products and solutions. On a day-to-day basis, working closely with senior development architects and the QA technical leads to develop the best QA strategies and test methodologies to meet and exceed quality goals. The Architect's role is expected to: Responsible for developing and designing the overall end-to-end test strategy for Cloud/Client solution releases. Define testing scope for complex projects. - Participate in product design reviews to ensure system testability and overall quality Design test scripts, test data, and execute test cases for complex technical and business solutions. Provide leadership and technical expertise within functional and non-functional Test Automation and Testing Ability to Design, develop, implement, and maintain tools and test frameworks. Work closely with Senior development architects/engineers and test teams to meet the Quality objectives of the solution releases. Evaluate emerging technologies, exercise independent judgment, develop innovation proposals, and make recommendations to senior management. Collaborate continuously with the program and product development teams to implement new features/requirements for the CI/CT/CD pipeline. Collaborate with product teams to strategize & align long-term solutions for test automation, including roadmap, tools, framework & approach. Recommends new tools, techniques, and methodologies to enhance productivity and quality. Participate in Agile Scrum activities and SAFe Ceremonies (Program Increment Planning, Adapt and Learn, Scrum of Scrums). Ability to effectively mentor and coach teams of senior engineers. Ability to benchmark internal practices with the latest industry practices and generate proposals for continuous improvement. Strong troubleshooting and root cause analysis abilities. Qualification, Competencies and Skills: Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science / closely related field with 15+ years of experience. Proven software architecture, design, and development experience providing software solutions, deploying, and maintaining applications. Required Technical Skills/Knowledge Expertise with distributed systems, and knowledge about microservices architecture patterns. Expertise in modern software tools and approaches (Git, CI/CD, Automated testing). Scripting and development experience in a broad range of programming languages (Java/ C#/Python) in Windows and Linux environments Hands-on experience in UI and/or API-level test automation expertise Extensive experience in test frameworks and tools like ROBOT, Selenium, BDD, REST APIs, and Postman Experience defining and executing non-functional test cases. Extensive experience in Test Management such as JIRA and ALM Experience in any of the following is desirable: Kubernetes and container technologies.
